import React, {useEffect,Fragment} from 'react'; import moment from 'moment'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { getUser } from '../../redux/users/users.actions'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/LogoGlyphMd.svg'; import SideBar from '../../components/leftSidePanel/sideBar.component'; import './UserPage.styles.scss' import Spinner from "../../components/spinner/spinner.component"; const UserPage = ({ getUser, user: { user, loading }, match }) => { useEffect(() => { getUser(match.params.id); // eslint-disable-next-line }, [getUser]); return loading || user === null ? :

}; UserPage.propTypes = { getUser: PropTypes.func.isRequired, user: PropTypes.object.isRequired }; const mapStateToProps = state => ({ user: state.user }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getUser })(UserPage);
